materials.name: Instructor Information
materials.description: Instructor: Jonathan Johannsen, Email: jjohannsen1@mtsac.edu, Office Location: 61-1612, Office Phone: (909) 274-4669. Office Hours: Monday and Wednesday from 12:15pm – 1:45pm, and Tuesday and Thursday from 8:40am – 9:10am.

materials.name: Course Requirements
materials.description: Textbook: Assembly Language for x86 Processors Eighth Edition by Kip Irvine, ISBN 9780136681649. Required Software: Access to a Windows computer with Microsoft Visual Studio 2022 community edition installed. Prerequisite: CSCI 110. Advisory: CSCI 140 or CSCI 145.

materials.name: Course Policies
materials.description: Covers attendance, lab activities, homework, projects, late submissions, quizzes, and exams. Grading Policy: Lab Exercises (5%), Participation (5%), Quizzes (5%), Homework and Projects (15%), Exam #1 (20%), Exam #2 (20%), Final (30%).
